content.body: Domenic Do you mind if I start working on https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/7996? It took me a while to understand how "wait until it asynchronously complete" and "custom perform the fetch steps" work, and I would be happy to help replacing them with more explicit constructs.
content.formatted_body: DomenicDo you mind if I start working on https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/7996? It took me a while to understand how "wait until it asynchronously complete" and "custom perform the fetch steps" work, and I would be happy to help replacing them with more explicit constructs.

content.body: Has anyone else noticed that HTML's section on "killing scripts" only focuses on killing script or module evaluation, rather than the evaluation of a callback?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Has anyone else noticed that HTML's section on "killing scripts" only focuses on killing script or module evaluation, rather than the evaluation of a callback?
